id.description: Played by British historian Simon Schama. Wears a Baron Harkonnen-style anti-grav harness to get around in normal gravity and has obvious cranial implants.

aspects.aspect: New Enough Arrival to Get Called "Carpetbagger"
Expand Fathom's Recognition in the Far Havens
Compromise Whenever Necessary On Anything But Land Rights

extras.extra: Gain a +2 bonus to any Knowledge, Science, or Technical roles where reasoning power is the determining factor. (Mindjammer pg 109)

character.notes: Jenn tells me his appearance and recent arrival from Astar is not especially noteworthy in Canopy. He's just an outlier of a tendency already common to the populace. His age cohort probably chuckles behind his back that it took him long enough to emigrate from Astar. Shares the communitarian outlook common to Canopy and Astar, presumably inspired by the demands of Astar's fully artificial enviornment (like Traveller's Glisten).
